function:
def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: Combining the uniformity of cell size and cell shape with clump thickness into a single metric can provide an overall measure of abnormality in cellular structure. This could help differentiate between benign and malignant cases.
    New Feature 1: structural_abnormality_index | structural_abnormality_index = (Cell_Size_Uniformity + Cell_Shape_Uniformity + Clump_Thickness) / 3
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    """
    Thought 1: Combining the uniformity of cell size and cell shape with clump thickness into a single metric can provide an overall measure of abnormality in cellular structure. This could help differentiate between benign and malignant cases.
    New Feature 1: structural_abnormality_index | structural_abnormality_index = (Cell_Size_Uniformity + Cell_Shape_Uniformity + Clump_Thickness) / 3
    
    Thought 2: The presence of multiple mitotic cell divisions in combination with high clump thickness may indicate a higher probability of malignancy.
    New Feature 2: high_mitotic_activity | high_mitotic_activity = (Mitoses > 5) & (Clump_Thickness > 5)

    Thought 3: Cells that exhibit high uniformity in size and shape along with high adhesion at the margins may represent a more concerning cellular structure.
    New Feature 3: high_cell_uniformity_adhesion | high_cell_uniformity_adhesion = (Cell_Size_Uniformity > 5) & (Cell_Shape_Uniformity > 5) & (Marginal_Adhesion > 5)
    """
    df_output = df_input.copy()
    
    # Calculate the structural abnormality index
    df_output['structural_abnormality_index'] = (
        df_output['Cell_Size_Uniformity'] + df_output['Cell_Shape_Uniformity'] + df_output['Clump_Thickness']
    ) / 3
    
    # Identify cases with high mitotic activity
    df_output['high_mitotic_activity'] = (df_output['Mitoses'] > 5) & (df_output['Clump_Thickness'] > 5)
    
    # Identify cases with high cell uniformity and adhesion
    df_output['high_cell_uniformity_adhesion'] = (df_output['Cell_Size_Uniformity'] > 5) & (df_output['Cell_Shape_Uniformity'] > 5) & (df_output['Marginal_Adhesion'] > 5)
    
    return df_output
